reviews.review: gud game, used to play a lot but not much anymore coz im shit at it lol
SG nerf finally, thank you Valve 10/10 meme

It's a fun game. A great game. It is and will always be one of my favorite games. It's good to feel like I can always climb higher than what I am. 

This game has amazing gunplay. The engine is old yet it still feels like a smooth experience.

The game is tilting yet so rewarding at the same time.

This game is a great chill game to play with friends and a fun game to play if you're in a competitive mood.

This game has i's bugs, and sometimes things happen that the community may or may not like (Valve is a great developer but does make mistakes.)

I love this game. I would recommend it to anyone. One piece of advice is that you can't go into this game expecting it to be easy to pick up. Knowledge of the game is what separates the silvers from the globals.
